5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Aishah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“When anyone of you performs prayer and commits Hadath, (passing wind) let him take hold of his nose, then leave.” Another chain with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أَحْدَثَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ كَيْفَ يَنْصَرِفُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning how to leave the prayer if one commits Hadath
